con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions name="HotelBookingEndpointService" targetNamespace="http://hotel.bp.org/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:tns="http://hotel.bp.org/" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:ns3="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http" xmlns:ns1="http://www.bp.org/hotel/"> <wsdl:import location="http://localhost:8080/soap-api/service/hotel?wsdl=HotelBooking.wsdl" namespace="http://www.bp.org/hotel/"></wsdl:import> <wsdl:binding name="HotelBookingEndpointServiceSoapBinding" type="ns1:HotelBooking"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="bookRoom"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://www.bp.org/hotel/bookRoom" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="bookRoom"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="bookRoomResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="HotelFaultMsg"> <soap:fault name="HotelFaultMsg" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="cancelBooking"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://www.bp.org/hotel/cancelBooking" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="cancelBooking"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="cancelBookingResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="HotelFaultMsg"> <soap:fault name="HotelFaultMsg" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="HotelBookingEndpointService"> <wsdl:port binding="tns:HotelBookingEndpointServiceSoapBinding" name="HotelBookingEndpointPort"> <soap:address location="http://localhost:8080/soap-api/service/hotel"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

<wsdl:definitions name="HotelBooking" targetNamespace="http://www.bp.org/hotel/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:ns2="http://www.bp.org" xmlns:ns1="http://www.bp.org/hotel/"> <wsdl:types> <xs:schema elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://www.bp.org/types" version="1.0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://www.bp.org/types"> <xs:complexType name="Person"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="firstName" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="lastName" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="Hotel"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="city" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="country" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="address" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="checkIn" type="xs:dateTime"/> <xs:element name="checkOut" type="xs:dateTime"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="BookingInfo"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="id" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element name="cost" type="xs:decimal"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="Fault"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="code" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element name="text" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="Flight"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="from" type="tns:Point"/> <xs:element name="to" type="tns:Point"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="Point"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="airport" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="date" type="xs:dateTime"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="PaymentCard"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="validTo" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="number" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema> <xs:schema elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://www.bp.org" version="1.0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:ns1="http://www.bp.org/types"> <xs:import namespace="http://www.bp.org/types"/> <xs:element name="bookRoomRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="person" type="ns1:Person"/> <xs:element name="hotel" type="ns1:Hotel"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="bookRoomResponse" type="ns1:BookingInfo"/> <xs:element name="cancelBookingRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence/> <xs:attribute name="bookingId" type="xs:int"/> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="cancelBookingResponse" type="ns1:BookingInfo"/> <xs:element name="hotelFault" type="ns1:Fault"/> </xs:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="cancelBooking"> <wsdl:part element="ns2:cancelBookingRequest" name="payload"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="HotelFaultMsg"> <wsdl:part element="ns2:hotelFault" name="HotelFaultMsg"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="bookRoomResponse"> <wsdl:part element="ns2:bookRoomResponse" name="payload"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="bookRoom"> <wsdl:part element="ns2:bookRoomRequest" name="payload"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="cancelBookingResponse"> <wsdl:part element="ns2:cancelBookingResponse" name="payload"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="HotelBooking"> <wsdl:operation name="bookRoom"> <wsdl:input message="ns1:bookRoom" name="bookRoom"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="ns1:bookRoomResponse" name="bookRoomResponse"></wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault message="ns1:HotelFaultMsg" name="HotelFaultMsg"></wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="cancelBooking"> <wsdl:input message="ns1:cancelBooking" name="cancelBooking"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="ns1:cancelBookingResponse" name="cancelBookingResponse"></wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault message="ns1:HotelFaultMsg" name="HotelFaultMsg"></wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> </wsdl:definitions>
